file.name: MoneyTransferServiceSpecification.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Transfer Money API
  description: Transfer Money API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8080/transfer'
    description: local server
paths:
  /transfer:
    post:
      summary: Transfer money card to card
      description: Call to send money between cards
      requestBody:
        description: Card from and card to
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                cardFromNumber:
                  type: string
                cardFromValidTill:
                  type: string
                cardFromCVV:
                  type: string
                cardToNumber:
                  type: string  
                amount:
                  type: object
                  properties:  
                    value:
                      type: integer
                    currency:
                      type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success transfer
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  operationId:
                    type: string
                    description: Operation id
        '400':
          description: Error input data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error customer message
                  id:
                    type: integer          
        '500':
          description: Error transfer
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error customer message
                  id:
                    type: integer
  /confirmOperation:
    post:
      summary: Confirm operation
      description: Confirming operataion with code
      requestBody:
        description: Confirm operation
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                operationId:
                  type: string
                  description: Operation id
                code:
                  type: string
                  description: Verification code
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success confirmation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  operationId:
                    type: string
                    description: Operation id
        '400':
          description: Error input data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error customer message
                  id:
                    type: integer          
        '500':
          description: Error confirmation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  message:
                    type: string
                    description: Error customer message
                  id:
                    type: integer
